name: post_almaws_v1_task-lists_printouts
description: This API performs an action on printouts: mark as printed or canceled. 10,000 records can be handled in one requests. Only printouts which were updated will be returned.

status.description: Printout status. Optional. Valid values are: Printed, Pending, Canceled.

printout_id.description: A list of Printout IDs (for example: 123,456,778) from 1 to the limit of 100 Optional. Use of this option overrides all of the filtering parameters

op.description: The operation to perform on the printout. Currently, the options are: 'mark_as_printed','mark_as_canceled'
